item.title: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“FinalFantasy, post:1, topic:268041”]Well it’s not as easy for me as it is for everyone else, my specials are coded differently, like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

If your wondering what the specialAtkNPC is, ill show you:

public void specialAtkNPC(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit, int emoteSet) {

So the only thing i can figure out is that the max times a spec can hit is twice, ive already tried something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

and it doesn’t work.

So could anyone help me?[/quote]

tell us wich source u using

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

Well it’s not as easy for me as it is for everyone else, my specials are coded differently, like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

If your wondering what the specialAtkNPC is, ill show you:

public void specialAtkNPC(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit, int emoteSet) {

So the only thing i can figure out is that the max times a spec can hit is twice, ive already tried something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

and it doesn’t work.

So could anyone help me?

Read full topic
